name.baseName: Natural gas ; Non-ultra-low sulfur gas ; Self spraying ; All sizes; NESPS2
天然气 ; 非超低含硫天然气 ; 自喷 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisWithout sulfur dioxide treatment technology，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisWithout sulfur dioxide treatment technology，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了用于处理天然气加工和工业活动中污染物的各种尾端管理技术及其技术效率。这些技术包括物理、化学和生物过程，用于管理和处理化学需氧量（COD）、石油相关废物、废水、二氧化硫和废气排放。它们被应用在旨在通过回注、滤分/浮分离、生物接触氧化、旋流脱气、开放排放等各种过程，包括SCOT工艺、双碱工艺和石灰石/石膏法等方法来减少这些污染物对环境影响的设施中。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码07文件，在完整版文件中第78页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + reinjection，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理+化学+回注，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + reinjection，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100

源文件中描述为为天然气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisFilter separation/floating separation + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是过滤分离/上浮分离+生物接触氧化法，其效率为92，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisHydrocyclone + degassing and oil removal tank + open drain tank discharge②，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是水力旋流器＋脱气除油罐＋开排沉箱排放②，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisCompact gas flotation machine + open drain tank discharge②，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
